column3: Latest;Kandal: A------ guesthouse named “Sok Visal” in Takhmao City was raided by provincial and  Anti-human Trafficking Police.------ Six women
column6: reportedly working as sex workers.------The crackdown took place at 9:30 pm on February 28
column11: Kandal Province.------A police officer of the Kompong Chhnang Office said the owner of the business
column13: a 35-year-old male was detained.------The source said that the suspect was being questioned by the Kandal provincial police commission to build a case file for court.------The six female victims were taken to the provincial specialized office and were also supported by an NGO.------https://postnews.com.kh/local/417686
